00031 using namespace RDK2::TextUtils;
00032 using namespace std;

00034 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00035 
00036 Point2d projectPointOntoLineOrSegment(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm, bool itIsALine)
00037 {
00038     double vx = segm.p1.x - segm.p0.x, vy = segm.p1.y - segm.p0.y;
00039     double wx = p.x - segm.p0.x, wy = p.y - segm.p0.y;
00040     double c1 = (wx*vx + wy*vy);
00041     if (!itIsALine && c1 <= 0) return segm.p0;
00042     else {
00043         double c2 = (vx*vx + vy*vy);
00044         if (!itIsALine && c2 <= c1) return segm.p1;
00045         double b = c1 / c2;
00046         double bx = segm.p0.x + b*vx;
00047         double by = segm.p0.y + b*vy;
00048         return Point2d(bx, by);
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 Point2d projectPointOntoLine(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm)
00053 {
00054     return projectPointOntoLineOrSegment(p, segm, true);
00055 }
00056 
00057 Point2d projectPointOntoSegment(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm)
00058 {
00059     return projectPointOntoLineOrSegment(p, segm, false);
00060 }
00061 
00062 double pointDistFromLine(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm)
00063 {
00064     Point2d projectedPoint = projectPointOntoLine(p, segm);
00065     return p.distTo(projectedPoint);
00066 }
00067 
00068 double pointDistFromSegment(const Point2d& p, const Segment2d& segm)
00069 {
00070     Point2d projectedPoint = projectPointOntoSegment(p, segm);
00071     return p.distTo(projectedPoint);
00072 }
00073 
00074 vector<Segment2d> recursiveLineFitting(const vector<Point2d>& points, double maxErrorAllowed)
00075 {
00076     set<int> endPoints;
00077     endPoints.insert(0);
00078     endPoints.insert(points.size() - 1);
00079     double maxDist = 0;
00080     do {
00081         int maxDistIndex = -1;
00082         maxDist = 0;
00083         set<int>::iterator it = endPoints.begin();
00084         set<int>::iterator it2 = ++endPoints.begin();
00085         for (; it2 != endPoints.end(); ++it, ++it2) {
00086             int i0 = *it;
00087             int i1 = *it2;
00088             Segment2d s;
00089             s.p0 = points[i0];
00090             s.p1 = points[i1];
00091             for (int j = i0 + 1; j < i1; j++) {
00092                 double dist = pointDistFromLine(points[j], s);
00093                 if (dist > maxDist) {
00094                     maxDist = dist;
00095                     maxDistIndex = j;
00096                 }
00097             }
00098         }
00099         if (maxDist > maxErrorAllowed) {
00100             endPoints.insert(maxDistIndex);
00101         }
00102     } while (maxDist > maxErrorAllowed);
00103 
00104     vector<Segment2d> retval;
00105     set<int>::iterator it = endPoints.begin();
00106     set<int>::iterator it2 = ++endPoints.begin();
00107     for (; it2 != endPoints.end(); ++it, ++it2) {
00108         Segment2d s;
00109         s.p0 = points[*it];
00110         s.p1 = points[*it2];
00111         retval.push_back(s);
00112     }
00113     return retval;
00114 }
